Class IgfsMetaManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends IgfsManager

      • fileIds

        public List<IgniteUuid> fileIds(IgfsPath path)
                         throws IgniteCheckedException
        Gets all file IDs for components of specified path. Result cannot be empty - there is at least root element. But each element (except the first) can be null if such files don't exist.
        Parameters:
        path - Path.
        Returns:
        Collection of file IDs for components of specified path.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • lock

        @Nullable
public IgfsEntryInfo lock(IgniteUuid fileId,
                                    boolean del)
                             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Lock the file explicitly outside of transaction.
        Parameters:
        fileId - File ID to lock.
        del - If file is being locked for delete.
        Returns:
        Locked file info or null if file cannot be locked or doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If the file with such id does not exist, or on another failure.

            throws IgniteCheckedException

        Parameters:
        fileId - File ID.
        lockId - Lock ID.
        modificationTime - Modification time to write to file info.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • unlock

                   IgniteUuid lockId,
                   long modificationTime,
                   boolean updateSpace,
                   long space,
                   @Nullable
                   IgfsFileAffinityRange affRange)
            throws IgniteCheckedException
        Remove explicit lock on file held by the current stream.
        Parameters:
        fileId - File ID.
        lockId - Lock ID.
        modificationTime - Modification time to write to file info.
        updateSpace - Whether to update space.
        space - Space.
        affRange - Affinity range.

        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

        public boolean sampling(Boolean val)
                 throws IgniteCheckedException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if sampling mode was actually changed by this call.

        Returns:
